events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I've attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund process. Looking forward to getting the refund soon.
The refund process is now complete; please check your account within the next few days for the reimbursement.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the refund appeared in my bank account yesterday. Thank you very much for your help.
We’re glad the refund was successful. Closing the case now, but feel free to reach out for any further assistance.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your support experience today.
